attributes.action: reassess the social housing criteria to allow all citizens to be applicable not just those on benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: full time working couples are being over looked at present when it comes to council housing as they are expected to pay high private rents or high morgages, this is not reasonable. A criteria that will allow a fair assessment of all applicants is well and truly needed.communities need all kinds of families.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
